title: Search For Love
description: He Harbored dark suspicions about Serenity and her parents. He was jealous, impossible and demanding. He was enignatic, charming and aristocratic. He made passionate love to her even while condemning her. So why in heaven's name had Serenity Smith from Georgetown, Washington, D.C., forever lost her heart to her French Cousin, Christophe, Count de Kergallen?
author: Nora Roberts
